    • getDesignerById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Designer> getDesignerById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Fetches a designer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the designer to fetch.
      Returns:
      The designer with the given ID, or 404 Not Found if not present.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Updates a designer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the designer to update.
      designer - The updated designer entity.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the success of the operation.

    • getDesignersByLocation

      @GetMapping("/location/{location}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Designer>> getDesignersByLocation(@PathVariable String location)

      Parameters:
      location - The location to filter designers by.
      Returns:

      Returns:
